trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review

trans-unit.source: Learn how to add roles to privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to add roles to privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review

trans-unit.source: Performing Security Review
trans-unit.target: Performing Security Review

trans-unit.source: It is very easy to review privileged access once a [security review has been started](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-start-security-review.md).
trans-unit.target: It is very easy to review privileged access once a [security review has been started](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-start-security-review.md).

trans-unit.source: For Reviewers: Approving or Denying Access
trans-unit.target: For Reviewers: Approving or Denying Access

trans-unit.source: Me Review
trans-unit.target: Me Review

trans-unit.source: In the PIM main menu, click **Review administrative access**.
trans-unit.target: In the PIM main menu, click **Review administrative access**.

trans-unit.source: A list of security reviews will appear.
trans-unit.target: A list of security reviews will appear.

trans-unit.source: Select the **user(s)** in the list for which you want to change access.
trans-unit.target: Select the **user(s)** in the list for which you want to change access.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Access will actually be changed.
trans-unit.target: NOTE: Access will actually be changed.

trans-unit.source: This process is simply building a checklist for those who would change the access for the role.
trans-unit.target: This process is simply building a checklist for those who would change the access for the role.

trans-unit.source: Once at least one user has been selected the **Approve access** and **Deny access** buttons will be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Once at least one user has been selected the **Approve access** and **Deny access** buttons will be enabled.

trans-unit.source: Click either **Approve access** or **Deny access** for the users you have selected.
trans-unit.target: Click either **Approve access** or **Deny access** for the users you have selected.

trans-unit.source: A notification will appear in the portal main menu and the review list will disappear.
trans-unit.target: A notification will appear in the portal main menu and the review list will disappear.

trans-unit.source: Close the **Review Azure AD roles** blade.
trans-unit.target: Close the **Review Azure AD roles** blade.

trans-unit.source: Self-review
trans-unit.target: Self-review

trans-unit.source: The user will receive an email indicating that they should review their access.
trans-unit.target: The user will receive an email indicating that they should review their access.

trans-unit.source: The email will contain a link for logging in to the portal.
trans-unit.target: The email will contain a link for logging in to the portal.

trans-unit.source: Once there, the user can approve or deny their own access by clicking on the **Approve access** or **Deny access** buttons.
trans-unit.target: Once there, the user can approve or deny their own access by clicking on the **Approve access** or **Deny access** buttons.

trans-unit.source: Their name will disappear from the list.
trans-unit.target: Their name will disappear from the list.

trans-unit.source: For Review Managers: Managing Security Reviews
trans-unit.target: For Review Managers: Managing Security Reviews

trans-unit.source: Completing or Stopping a Review
trans-unit.target: Completing or Stopping a Review

trans-unit.source: Go back to the PIM dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Go back to the PIM dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Click on the security review you want to complete in the **Security reviews** list.
trans-unit.target: Click on the security review you want to complete in the **Security reviews** list.

trans-unit.source: The security review's detail blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The security review's detail blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click **Stop review** to complete or stop the review.
trans-unit.target: Click **Stop review** to complete or stop the review.

trans-unit.source: This will archive the review and the blade will disappear.
trans-unit.target: This will archive the review and the blade will disappear.

trans-unit.source: Exporting a review
trans-unit.target: Exporting a review

trans-unit.source: You can export a review for use with Excel or other program that can use CSV files.
trans-unit.target: You can export a review for use with Excel or other program that can use CSV files.

trans-unit.source: Go back to the PIM dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Go back to the PIM dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **Security reviews** section of the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **Security reviews** section of the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The **Security reviews** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Security reviews** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click on the security review that you want to export.
trans-unit.target: Click on the security review that you want to export.

trans-unit.source: The security review's detail blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The security review's detail blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Export** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Export** button.

trans-unit.source: A CSV file will start downloading.
trans-unit.target: A CSV file will start downloading.

trans-unit.source: Deleing a Review
trans-unit.target: Deleing a Review

trans-unit.source: AZURE.WARNING [You will not get a warning before deletion occurs, so be sure that you *want* to actually delete that review.]
trans-unit.target: AZURE.WARNING [You will not get a warning before deletion occurs, so be sure that you *want* to actually delete that review.]

trans-unit.source: Go back to the PIM dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Go back to the PIM dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **Security reviews** section of the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **Security reviews** section of the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The **Security reviews** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Security reviews** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click on the security review that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Click on the security review that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: The security review's detail blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The security review's detail blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Delete** button.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
